name: Crystal Warriors-Demo
description:
Crystal Warriors is a competitive experience for 2 players. Race to collect as many crystals as possible, before the time runs out. This Demo, pits the Samurai against the Viking, in Feudal Japan.

Please note, this is a demo, there are incomplete animation assets and not all of the features are yet implemented. The game can be played via 2 Xbox Controllers, both players on a single keyboard, or Player 1 using an Xbox Controller and Player 2 using keyboard.

Please follow the development on Twitter https://twitter.com/penguin_brave

Upcoming Features:

  • Buffs/Debuffs
  • Special Attacks
  • Aerial Maneuvers
  • New Levels
  • New Characters
